flavor_text: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather they all learn the same saying.
It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It imitates human speech.
Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result it can cleverly mimic human speech.
It mimics the cries of other Pokemon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
